testcase.name: Searching for a new car
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the home page https://www.carsguide.com.au of carsguide website.passed When I move to buyAndsell menu..............................................passed Then I click on Search cars.................................................passed And I Select make as "BMW"..................................................passed And I Select Model as "1 Series"............................................passed And I Select location as "WA - All".........................................passed And I Select price as "$10,000".............................................passed And I click on Find my next car button......................................passed Then I should see list of searched cars from "BMW"..........................passed And the page title should be "Bmw 1 Series Under 10000 for Sale WA | carsguide".passed

testcase.name: FB test case with correct un and pwd
testcase.system-out: Given when user is home page................................................passed When I enter UN as "rameshsoft.selenium" and pwd as "practice"..............passed And when i click on login button............................................passed Then login page should be opened as "Log in to Facebook | Facebook".........passed
